ygData.subject: RE: oops..
ygData.msgSnippet: Well for the first time in months MM was actually camped heavily last night on my server so I never got to talk to the guy.. I saw him once, right before
ygData.messageBody:
Well for the first time in months MM was actually camped heavily last night
on my server so I never got to talk to the guy.. I saw him once, right
before several high lvl casters decided to make an example of him.. I'm
hoping I can get on late tonight and have no one else around..

On the faction side, I also stopped in High Keep looking for Leyna(sp?), not
to be found.. And I realized that it takes a hell of a lot of bards to get
your faction increased. (That plus their are on a 20min respawn makes it
annoying as hell). Now the million dollar question, do you actually need MM
faction to do the quest, plus I've heard rumors that there are only 4 SK
armor pieces (compared to 7 for the other classes) can anybody confirm this?



-----Original Message-----
From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 14, 1999 12:41 AM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] oops..


From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>

the lenya quest seems to have been removed. i'll give you two guesses, and
they are probably both right :)

i screwed up about the MM quest hehe.. it DOES work. you just have to say
the exact right thing to the npc: "how do i get shadow knight armor". sounds
obvious maybe, but you shoulda been there with us when we were fielding
questions..

i still feel the frequent death of the thing and its 6+ hour respawn time
are legitimate gripes. otherwise, once you get the shopping list for items,
these quests are practically handed to us compared to the other class armor
quests.

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro

-=The Shadow Knight Mailing List=-
-= Support Evil Roleplaying =-
